title: Nettle tea

properties.name: description
properties.value: Nettle tea is a hot drink that can be obtained by cooking nettle-water on a fire or cooking range, requiring level 20 Cooking and granting 52 experience when successful. Players may accidentally let the water boil over, returning an empty bowl; the rate of success while making these will increase as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop boiling over entirely at Cooking level 54 on both ranges and fires.

Nettle tea
Released15 February 2005 (Update)
MembersYes

Advanced data
Item ID4239

Nettle tea is a hot drink that can be obtained by cooking nettle-water on a fire or cooking range, requiring level 20 Cooking and granting 52 experience when successful. Players may accidentally let the water boil over, returning an empty bowl; the rate of success while making these will increase as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop boiling over entirely at Cooking level 54 on both ranges and fires.

Drinking the tea heals 3 hitpoints. If you are not at full hitpoints the tea will also refresh some run energy (5%). This item is used during the Ghosts Ahoy quest and the Skippy and the Mogres miniquest.

Custom tea[edit | edit source]

A bucket of milk may also be added to the tea to create milky nettle tea, but this does not change the effects of the drink. Nettle tea can be put into an empty cup to make a cup of tea. This does not change the effects of the drink. This particular kind of tea cannot be added to a tea flask.

How to make nettle tea[edit | edit source]

You will need nettles and a bowl of water. Optional: an empty cup, bucket of milk. To pick nettles you will need some kind of gloves.

  1. Fill a bowl with water.
  2. Put some picked nettles into the bowl of water.
  3. Boil the nettle-water by using it with a fire or range.
  4. Optional: Use the bowl of nettle-water with an empty cup.
  5. Optional: Lastly add a bucket of milk to create a milky bowl/cup of tea.

It will stop boiling over entirely at [[Cooking]] level 54 on both ranges and fires. Drinking the tea heals 3 [[hitpoints]]. If you are not at full hitpoints the tea will also refresh some run [[energy]] (5%).
